private.live: This private collection is now live. Only those who you share the collection link with will be able to view this page.
private.updated: Done! Your private collection has been updated. Only those who you share the collection link with will be able to view this page.

public.live: This public collection is now live. This collection is searchable on the Gateway and can be viewed by all users.
public.updated: Done! Your public collection has been updated. This collection is searchable on the Gateway and can be viewed by all users.

newDatasetVersionSubmitted: Version {{versionNumber}} of this dataset been submitted by data custodian {{firstName}} {{lastName}}
datasetVersionApproved: Version {{versionNumber}} of this dataset been approved by admin {{firstName}} {{lastName}}
datasetVersionArchived: Version {{versionNumber}} of this dataset been archived by data custodian {{firstName}} {{lastName}}
datasetVersionUnarchived: Version {{versionNumber}} of this dataset been unarchived by data custodian {{firstName}} {{lastName}}
question: Question

activitylog.notfound: The activity log for this dataset cannot be accessed. It must be set to {{status}}.

approvalModal.title: Approve this version of this dataset metadata
approvalModal.description: If you made any amendments to their application, such as fixing a type, please let the editor know using the description below.

rejectModal.title: Reject this version of this dataset metadata
rejectModal.description: Let the editor know why this submission is being rejected. They will be able to create a new version and make a new submission.

validationErrosModal.title: Mandatory fields missing
validationErrosModal.description: You cannot submit this dataset for review until you have completed all the mandatory questions. If you need to submit this dataset without the mandatory answers, please raise a support ticket at the following link:

validationErrosAdminModal.title: Mandatory fields missing
validationErrosAdminModal.description: Are you sure that you want to submit this version of this dataset for review? There are mandatory fields missing. You cannot edit this form whilst it is pending.

submitForReviewModal.title: Submit version for review?
submitForReviewModal.description:
Are you sure that you want to submit this version of this dataset for review?

You cannot edit this form whilst it is pending.'

createNewVersionModal.title: Create new version?
createNewVersionModal.description: Are you sure that you want to create a new draft version of this dataset?

archiveModal.title: Archive this version?
archiveModal.description: This will remove your dataset from search results, but anyone with a direct link will still be able to access the page with a message explaining that it has been archived.

unArchiveModal.title: Un-archive this dataset?
unArchiveModal.description: This dataset will appear in search results again. You will be able to create a new version from this dataset once it has been un-archived.

approveWithConditionsModal.title: Application approval with conditions
approveWithConditionsModal.description: Are you sure you want to apprive this application? If so, please provide the conditions of this approval to the applicant

deleteDraftModal.title: Delete draft
deleteDraftModal.description: Are you sure you want to delete this draft dataset? You will no longer be able to view this form and will lose any answers provided. All team members will be notified.

duplicateModal.title: Duplicate this dataset metadata?
duplicateModal.description: Are you sure you want to duplicate this dataset? All team members will be notified of this duplication.

description.admin: View, add, edit, archive and check the status of your datasets.

selected.relevance: Sort by match to search terms

notifications.teamEmailText: Send email notifications to team email address

upload.successfulCheck: Your file has been successfully uploaded.
upload.SuccessfulUpload: Your data uses have been successfully uploaded and are waiting for approval.
upload.downloadTemplateSubText: Please use the template provided to add new approved data uses . You can also download your current data useregister from the Gateway, edit offline and uploading the edited file here:
upload.fileType: Excel or xls. Max 10MB per file.
upload.errorLoading: There was an error loading the file
upload.errors: There are errors in the data you uploaded. Please correct these and try again. Errors are listed below.
upload.warning: Warning! Uploading a new file will delete any data uses that have not yet been submitted for admin checks by the gateway team.
upload.requiredError: Error in row {{row}} Mandatory field “{{column}}” is empty
upload.duplicateError: Error in row {{row}} : Suspected data use duplicate
upload.duplicateRowError: Error in row {{row}}: Suspected data use duplicate of row {{duplicateRow}}
upload.pageInfoUser: Manage your data use register by editing data uses.
upload.pageInfoTeam: Manage your data use register by uploading or editing data uses.

widget.heading: Data use widget
widget.description: A data use widget is a great way of demonstrating transparency of how health data is being used, by connecting users of your website to the Gateway data use register. The widget will enable you to embed a link to the Gateway data use results page, pre-filtered on your organisation's data uses.
widget.buttonHelp: Click the button below to see your filtered data uses
widget.howToHeader: How to start using your widget
widget.howToDesc: Below is an interactive example of how your widget could look and be used. Please note that this design is compatible with mobile devices and can be resized to fit anywhere on your website. To start using this widget please accept the terms and conditions by clicking on the 'Get widget' button below.
widget.tAndCHelp: By embedding content in your website or app, you are agreeing to the Terms and Conditions
widget.copyCodeHelp: Copy the source code and share with your development team to display the widget above on your website
